description.text: Numbered is a full-service creative studio working with fashion, tech & lifestyle brands.

intro_text.text: We are looking for talented people.
You are passionate,  digital native and want looking for a new adventure in a creative agency?
We would love to hear about you!

excerpt.text:
You are passionate,
digital native and looking for a new adventure in a creative agency?

We would love to hear about you!

description.text: A creative studio working with exclusive Fashion, Tech & Lifestyle brands. Multifaceted sharp minds collaborating hand in hand on top-notch digital projects. Driven by building beautiful experiences & products for our devoted clients. We stand for passion, aspiration, and enthusiasm in our daily work. On track for opening our horizon to new acute & atypical profiles to complete our team.

A UX designer with fresh ideas to help us with the execution of the user flow design experience. A creative thinker with great technical skills and a desire to create flows, wireframes, interactive prototypes while working closely with our UI design team and Clients. Eager to set yourself new challenges by working on multiple eclectic projects. Inquisitive, with a strong visual sense, an analytical mind, and a good eye for detail to complete our talented design team.

A creative team avid to imagine tomorrow’s digital concepts. You will work closely with the Creative director, Design team, and Development team to translate beautiful identities into a seamless digital experience. You will take responsibility for UX & prime digital design. We will communicate sharply with our clients to guide them into their digital evolution.
4 years minimum of experience as UX designer for web pages and mobile apps
A background in Website Design/ E-commerce, either as formal training and/or gained through the work practice
Strong curiosity for the design / tech world
Readiness to create wireframes and prototypes to communicate and test your best interaction ideas
Ability to work on several projects at the same time
Experience in working with designers in agile teams
Have a basic understanding of HTML and CSS
Full-time job with an awesome creative team
Work from a beautiful spacious office in the heart of Amsterdam or remotely
23 days of holidays through the year
Send your portfolio, side projects, and CV to jobs@numbered.com Please make sure that the subject of the letter starts with ‘UX Designer”.

excerpt.text:
You are passionate,
digital native and looking for a new adventure in a creative agency?

We would love to hear about you!

description.text: Numbered is a full-service creative studio working with fashion, tech & lifestyle brands. We collaborate closely with our clients to tell their stories, engaging audiences by building beautiful experiences & products.
We strongly believe every brand and project is unique and should be tailor-made from industry leaders to early stage companies.
We are looking for a trainee project manager to join our team.
You communicate clearly, are organized, like to set everything in motion and have excellent project management skills – such as monitoring quality, budget and planning.
Do you recognize yourself in this? Then send us an email, you might join our team soon ;)

You’ll join our scrum team to help them ensure that the wishes of our client are properly translated into the team and the planning. You’ll learn to switch from different projects to different interlocuteur, from UX/UI designer, to developers.
You have experience as a project manager in a digital agency is a plus.
You are autonomous, a go-getter and solution-oriented
You are honest, realistic and are not afraid to give and receive good feedback.
You speak and write excellently in English.
6 months trainee contract with the goal to move to a 1 year contract after
The chance to work with really nice clients
A super nice workplace in the nine streets
Send your portfolio, side projects and resume at jobs@numbered.studio with a title ‘Trainee Project Manager”

excerpt.text:
You are passionate,
digital native and looking for a new adventure in a creative agency?

We would love to hear about you!

description.text: A creative studio working with exclusive Fashion, Tech & Lifestyle brands. Multifaceted sharp minds collaborating hand in hand on top-notch digital projects. Driven by building beautiful experiences & products for our devoted clients. We stand for passion, aspiration, and enthusiasm in our daily work. On track for opening our horizon to new acute & atypical profiles to complete our team.

An experienced digital producer with a positive, vibrant personality. Natural team player, simultaneously used to hold ownership of projects and keep an eagle view over all the processes.  
As a Digital Producer in Numbered, you are mainly responsible for managing your project in terms of timing and budget, keeping a good communication flow with the client until completion. Therefore you probably have strong organizational and creative skills. You also can monitor the planning and budgeting. Moreover, you are a strategic thinker, highly analytical, and results-driven. Provider of quick out-of-the-box solutions to situational everyday challenges. Keen to simultaneously work on multiple eclectic projects, support your team, and become THE Numbered person for our clients. That is why it is important that you have strong communication skills, and can negotiate well. You have an appeal for digital campaigns and see the digital environment as the communication terrain for outstanding ideas and aesthetics.

A creative team avid to imagine tomorrow’s digital concepts. You will work closely with creatives, production teams, and management to translate the bravest campaign concepts into a seamless experience. We will communicate sharply with our clients to guide them into their digital evolution.
4 years minimum of experience as a producer in creative industries
Ability to work on several projects at the same time
Experience in working with multiple team players and managing resources in agile terms
Familiarity with management tools (e.g. Asana, Slack, Excel)
Experience in digital production for design and advertising agencies
Have a basic understanding of HTML and CSS as well as Figma
Full-time job with an awesome creative team
Work from a beautiful spacious office in the heart of Amsterdam
23 days of holidays through the year
Send your portfolio, side projects, and CV to jobs@numbered.studio Please make sure that the subject of the letter starts with ‘Digital Producer”.

We collaborate closely with our clients to tell their stories, engaging audiences by building beautiful experiences & products. We strongly believe every brand and project is unique and should be tailor-made from industry leaders to early stage companies. We are looking for a med project manager to join our team.
You communicate clearly, are organized, like to set everything in motion and have excellent project management skills – such as monitoring quality, budget and planning.
Do you recognize yourself in this? Then send us an email, you might join our team soon ;)

You’ll join our scrum team to help them ensure that the wishes of our client are properly translated into the team and the planning. You’ll learn to switch from different projects to different interlocuteur, from UX/UI designer, to developers.
You have experience as a project manager in a digital agency.
You are autonomous, a go-getter and solution-oriented
You are honest, realistic and are not afraid to give and receive good feedback.

Interest in design trends, UX design, creative technology and digital marketing

Based in Amsterdam, Netherlands / New-york USA

description.text: We’re looking for a Digital Designer to join our team. You’ll help with the execution of the digital design, working closely with the Creative Director, Art Director, and Development Team to translate beautiful identities merci seamless digital experiences. Taking responsibility for ux & top notch digital design.

A Digital designer with fresh ideas to help us with the execution of the digital design. A creative thinker with great technical skills in web design. Eager to set yourself new challenges by working on multiple eclectic projects. From one-off digital projects to full website designs. Always pushing yourself beyond your capabilities. You have an appeal for Products and Interface with typography and lay-out leanings. Inquisitive, with a strong visual sense, an analytical mind and a good eye for detail to complete our talented designer team.

A creative team avid to imagine tomorrow’s digital concepts. You will work closely with the Creative director, Design team and Development team to translate beautiful identities into seamless digital experience. You will take responsibilities for UX & prime digital design. We will communicate sharply with our clients to guide them into their digital evolution.
Ability to work on several projects at the same time
Interest in design trends, UX design, creative technology and digital marketing
Have a basic understanding of HTML and CSS
Working in an awesome creative team
Send your portfolio, side projects and resume at jobs@numbered.studio with a title ‘Mid-Level Digital Designer”
